title: Dogfood RLM: Refactor Git Monolith
overview: The Code Archaeology report (Item 067) identified `src/git/index.ts` as a 1200+ line 'God Object' and a top technical debt hotspot. We will use the RLM agent to break this monolith into focused modules: `branch.ts`, `pr.ts`, `status.ts`, and `validation.ts`.
problem_statement: `src/git/index.ts` is too large, hard to maintain, and serializes all operations via a global mutex. It violates the single-responsibility principle.
motivation: To prove RLM's capability to handle massive refactors (1200+ lines context) and to execute the strategic recommendations from the archaeology report.
success_criteria: RLM agent performs the refactor autonomously
technical_constraints: Must verify using the existing git test suite
